title: Why is vaccinating better than essential oils?
description: Answer (1 of 5): Because essential oils cannot really cure virulent infectious diseases. The best (and only) way to protect yourself against such diseases is vaccination or failing that, antibiotics. Essential oils do have certain antiviral or antibacterial properties.
